text: Paintbox may refer to: * Quantel Paintbox, software * Paint Box (song), the 1967 Pink Floyd song * Paintbox (software), graphics utility released for the ZX Spectrum 48K in 1983. Published by Print'n'Plotter Products Ltd in the UK and re-released by Erbe Software S.A. in Spain. Written by Joe Gillespie.
title: Paintbox
